name: Apothecary Initiate
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Kithkin jealously hoard their knowledge of poultices and remedies so that no outside threat can benefit from their wisdom.

name: Armored Ascension
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.
flavor_text:
"Why enchant feathers to make them sturdy when we can enchant shields to make them fly?"
—Braenna, cobblesmith

name: Ballynock Cohort
oracle_text: First strike
Ballynock Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another white creature.
flavor_text: A kithkin's worst enemy is solitude.

name: Barrenton Medic
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Put a -1/-1 counter on Barrenton Medic: Untap Barrenton Medic.
flavor_text: His dreams are filled with noxious powders and clinking vials.

name: Boon Reflection
oracle_text: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.
flavor_text: Kithkin healers chant the clan songs of both their parents over the broth to double its curative effect.

name: Goldenglow Moth
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Goldenglow Moth blocks, you may gain 4 life.
flavor_text: Ordinary moths follow it, drawn to its light.

name: Greater Auramancy
oracle_text: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.
flavor_text: A delicate veil of glamers can prove as sturdy as iron.

name: Inquisitor's Snare
oracle_text: Prevent all damage target attacking or blocking creature would deal this turn. If that creature is black or red, destroy it.
flavor_text: Driven by their paranoia, kithkin inflict on their foes all the agonies they believe would have been inflicted on them.

name: Kithkin Rabble
oracle_text: Vigilance
Kithkin Rabble's power and toughness are each equal to the number of white permanents you control.
flavor_text: If even the slightest hint of panic enters the thoughtweft, bakers, potters, and even medics drop their spoons and salves to take up arms.

name: Kithkin Shielddare
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Target blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The nova glyph is a potent symbol. A shield embossed with it can resist the force of even the most determined giant.

name: Last Breath
oracle_text: Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Tsk. You'd think those nasty merrows would know how to hold their breath."
—Olka, mistmeadow witch

name: Mass Calcify
oracle_text: Destroy all nonwhite creatures.
flavor_text: The dead serve as their own tombstones.

name: Mine Excavation
oracle_text: Return target artifact or enchantment card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Mistmeadow Skulk
oracle_text: Lifelink, protection from converted mana cost 3 or greater
flavor_text: Doyo suspected the boggarts of brewing a plot against his crop, so he scythed away his grain to clear the sightlines.

name: Niveous Wisps
oracle_text: Target creature becomes white until end of turn. Tap that creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: In a world devoid of sun, illumination comes from cheerless fires or the wandering spirits of the dead.

name: Order of Whiteclay
oracle_text: {1}{W}{W}, {Q}: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: Made from the clay of burial mounds, the face paint of the priests is a sign of their respect for those whose rest they interrupt.

name: Pale Wayfarer
oracle_text: {2}{W}{W}, {Q}: Target creature gains protection from the color of its controller's choice until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: As it wandered Shadowmoor, it did not remember its crime—only its shame.

name: Prison Term
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may attach Prison Term to that creature.
flavor_text: Clear out the cell. Bring in the next prisoner.

name: Resplendent Mentor
oracle_text: White creatures you control have "{T}: You gain 1 life."
flavor_text: Thoughtweft gives new meaning to the phrase "common knowledge."

name: Rune-Cervin Rider
oracle_text: Flying
{G/W}{G/W}: Rune-Cervin Rider gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Things of beauty are in constant peril. The riders whisk them to safety, ahead of the encroaching darkness.

name: Runed Halo
oracle_text: As Runed Halo enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
You have protection from the chosen name. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything with that name.)

name: Safehold Sentry
oracle_text: {2}{W}, {Q}: Safehold Sentry gets +0/+2 until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: "These bracers were worn by my father and by his mother before him. Boggart fangs have shattered on them. Cinder flames have withered at their touch. While I wear them, the safehold will not fall."

name: Spectral Procession
oracle_text: Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
flavor_text:
"The dead have it easy. They suffer no more. If breaking their rest helps the living, so be it."
—Olka, mistmeadow witch

name: Strip Bare
oracle_text: Destroy all Auras and Equipment attached to target creature.
flavor_text:
"All glamers lifted, all lies revealed, all flesh exposed."
—Awylla, elvish safewright

name: Twilight Shepherd
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
When Twilight Shepherd enters the battlefield, return to your hand all cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Windbrisk Raptor
oracle_text: Flying
Attacking creatures you control have lifelink.
flavor_text: It awakened to gloom-fouled skies and responded with a righteous rage that shook the heavens.

name: Woeleecher
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature. If you do, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: One head senses the curse. The second loosens it from the soul. The third drinks it as an invigorating mist.

name: Advice from the Fae
oracle_text: ({2/U} can be paid with any two mana or with {U}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)

Look at the top five cards of your library. If you control more creatures than each other player, put two of those cards into your hand. Otherwise, put one of them into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Biting Tether
oracle_text: Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text: A chain of lies as strong as steel.

name: Briarberry Cohort
oracle_text: Flying
Briarberry Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another blue creature.
flavor_text: A clique can cause far more mischief than one faerie on its own.

name: Cerulean Wisps
oracle_text: Target creature becomes blue until end of turn. Untap that creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"If you see ghostly lights by the river, eat three twigs of marshroot to ward off kelpies."
—Kithkin superstition

name: Consign to Dream
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. If that permanent is red or green, put it on top of its owner's library instead.
flavor_text:
"Dreams are fleeting. Reality even more so."
—Oona, queen of the fae

name: Counterbore
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

name: Cursecatcher
oracle_text: Sacrifice Cursecatcher: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor_text: "Of all the things that can be stolen, opportunity is the most valuable."

name: Deepchannel Mentor
oracle_text: Blue creatures you control can't be blocked.
flavor_text: The rivers can no longer provide safe passage for travelers and commerce. They serve only as highways for raiders and channels for blood and woe.

name: Drowner Initiate
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: Nothing satisfies a merrow as much as drowning what it cannot have.

name: Faerie Swarm
oracle_text: Flying
Faerie Swarm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of blue permanents you control.
flavor_text: Untouched by the Aurora, Oona's faeries greeted the night like any other day.

name: Flow of Ideas
oracle_text: Draw a card for each Island you control.
flavor_text:
"Beware the merrows, whose envy and covetousness surpasses even that of the ravenous whirlpools where they dwell."
—The Book of Other Folk

name: Ghastly Discovery
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)
flavor_text: Korrigans, spirits bound to sources of water, shriek when they come upon their own drowned corpses.

name: Isleback Spawn
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Isleback Spawn gets +4/+8 as long as a library has twenty or fewer cards in it.
flavor_text: The more deadly the lake monster, the shorter the tale.

name: Kinscaer Harpoonist
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Kinscaer Harpoonist attacks, you may have target creature lose flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The suspicious kithkin of Kinscaer patrol the skies, their eyes attuned to the shapes of outsiders.

name: Knacksaw Clique
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{U}, {Q}: Target opponent exiles the top card of their library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: Most of the Knacksaw clique's skills were hewn from the minds of others.

name: Leech Bonder
oracle_text: Leech Bonder enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it.
{U}, {Q}: Move a counter from target creature onto a second target creature. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: Some don't know his face, but his pets are a dead giveaway.

name: Merrow Wavebreakers
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {Q}: Merrow Wavebreakers gains flying until end of turn. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: The merrows' prey have retreated from the shore, so they have learned to follow.

name: Parapet Watchers
oracle_text: {W/U}: Parapet Watchers gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A kithkin doun is not so much a town as a fortress, built to withstand the constantly besieging darkness. Only those most watchful and trustworthy are tasked with guarding its walls.

name: Prismwake Merrow
oracle_text: Flash
When Prismwake Merrow enters the battlefield, target permanent becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Seeing is believing" is a fact the merrows ruthlessly exploit in their dealings with the other residents of Shadowmoor.

name: Puca's Mischief
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange control of target nonland permanent you control and target nonland permanent an opponent controls with an equal or lesser converted mana cost.

name: Put Away
oracle_text: Counter target spell. You may shuffle up to one target card from your graveyard into your library.
flavor_text: Kithkin spellbottlers spend half their time preserving old memories and the other half punishing the new.

name: River Kelpie
oracle_text: Whenever River Kelpie or another permanent enters the battlefield from a graveyard, draw a card.
Whenever a player casts a spell from a graveyard, draw a card.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Savor the Moment
oracle_text: Take an extra turn after this one. Skip the untap step of that turn.
flavor_text: The merrow took a moment for herself. She never gave it back.

name: Sinking Feeling
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
Enchanted creature has "{1}, Put a -1/-1 counter on this creature: Untap this creature."

name: Spell Syphon
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each blue permanent you control.
flavor_text: Warrik Brutehexer felt betrayed that his aura favored the depths of the Wanderbrine River over its rightful place, hovering around him.

name: Thought Reflection
oracle_text: If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead.
flavor_text: Knowledge fills the mind of a fool and opens the mind of the sage.

name: Whimwader
oracle_text: Whimwader can't attack unless defending player controls a blue permanent.
flavor_text:
"Thought? Deceit? Progress? Now you're just making it hungry."
—Abral, kithkin alchemist

name: Aphotic Wisps
oracle_text: Target creature becomes black and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Merrows skulk the silty bogs around the Wanderbrine, their very thoughts stained with evil.

name: Ashenmoor Cohort
oracle_text: Ashenmoor Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another black creature.
flavor_text:
"None will concede a place for us in this world. If it is not for us, neither shall it be for them. We rest not until they choke in its cold ashes."
—Illulia of Nighthearth

name: Beseech the Queen
oracle_text: ({2/B} can be paid with any two mana or with {B}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)
Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.

name: Blowfly Infestation
oracle_text: Whenever a creature dies, if it had a -1/-1 counter on it, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: When the giant Tollek Worldslayer fell, a corruption erupted from his corpse to carry on his name.

name: Cinderbones
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Cinderbones.
flavor_text: Not all coals lie quietly in their beds of cold ash.

name: Cinderhaze Wretch
oracle_text: {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.
Put a -1/-1 counter on Cinderhaze Wretch: Untap Cinderhaze Wretch.
flavor_text: Thick smoke billows and twists to form disturbing faces that cackle and click their teeth to the popping embers.

name: Corrosive Mentor
oracle_text: Black creatures you control have wither. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: Guttering cinders stoke their dying flames by snuffing out the lights of others.

name: Corrupt
oracle_text: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text: There are things beneath the murk for whom the bog is a stew, a thin broth in need of meat.

name: Crowd of Cinders
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Crowd of Cinders's power and toughness are each equal to the number of black permanents you control.
flavor_text: They envy the life-giving heat so much that they tear it from those who still possess it.

name: Disturbing Plot
oracle_text: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Dusk Urchins
oracle_text: Whenever Dusk Urchins attacks or blocks, put a -1/-1 counter on it.
When Dusk Urchins dies, draw a card for each -1/-1 counter on it.
flavor_text: They spawn from shadow, wreaking chaos until shadow claims them again.

name: Faerie Macabre
oracle_text: Flying
Discard Faerie Macabre: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards.
flavor_text: The line between dream and death is gauzy and fragile. She leads those too near it from one side to the other.

name: Gloomlance
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. If that creature was green or white, its controller discards a card.
flavor_text: Death stings the victim only once, but those left behind feel the pain of loss with every passing memory.

name: Hollowborn Barghest
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have no cards in hand, each opponent loses 2 life.
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand, they lose 2 life.
flavor_text: It leaves a trail of crumpled trees and dashed dreams.

name: Hollowsage
oracle_text: Whenever Hollowsage becomes untapped, you may have target player discard a card.
flavor_text: Dreams of dark nights to come are said to stir in the minds of scheming hollowsages.

name: Incremental Blight
oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.
flavor_text: Shadowmoor's main crops are rot, slime, and despair.

name: Loch Korrigan
oracle_text: {U/B}: Loch Korrigan gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Don't look upon still waters without first breaking the surface. The korrigan will catch you with her gaze and drag you to your death."
—Kithkin superstition

name: Midnight Banshee
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on each nonblack creature.
flavor_text: Many have heard the beginning of its low, sustained shriek but few the end.

name: Plague of Vermin
oracle_text: Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of life. Repeat this process until no one pays life. Each player creates a 1/1 black Rat creature token for each 1 life they paid this way.

name: Polluted Bonds
oracle_text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: The mystic bond between spellcasters and the land is just as vulnerable to attack as the casters themselves.

name: Puppeteer Clique
oracle_text: Flying

When Puppeteer Clique enters the battlefield, put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. At the beginning of your next end step, exile it.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Rite of Consumption
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Rite of Consumption deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player or planeswalker. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

name: Sickle Ripper
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: His sickle was forged in the heat of another cinder's funeral pyre.

name: Smolder Initiate
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: "Life is a circle. Death is a vicious circle."

name: Splitting Headache
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target player discards two cards.
• Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: All faeries delve for dreams. But not all wait for their victims to fall asleep.

name: Torture
oracle_text: Enchant creature
{1}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text: What the vigor of life builds up, agony tears down again.

name: Wound Reflection
oracle_text: At the beginning of each end step, each opponent loses life equal to the life they lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor_text: The mission of the Nighthearth, Illulia's cult of murderous cinders, is to intensify every pain suffered in Shadowmoor.

name: Blistering Dieflyn
oracle_text: Flying
{B/R}: Blistering Dieflyn gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Any kithkin smith would love to catch a dieflyn for her kiln, relieving her of ever having to gather fuel again.

name: Bloodmark Mentor
oracle_text: Red creatures you control have first strike.
flavor_text: Boggarts divide the world into two categories: things you can eat, and things you have to chase down and pummel before you can eat.

name: Bloodshed Fever
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: Cinder mages enjoy seeing their victims in the throes of bloodlust—and seeing the regret that inevitably follows.

name: Boggart Arsonists
oracle_text: Plainswalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.)
{2}{R}, Sacrifice Boggart Arsonists: Destroy target Scarecrow or Plains.
flavor_text: The Aurora transformed Nibb and Gyik from mischief-makers into feral marauders. They still don't know much about tool safety.

name: Burn Trail
oracle_text: Burn Trail deals 3 damage to any target.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Cragganwick Cremator
oracle_text: When Cragganwick Cremator enters the battlefield, discard a card at random. If you discard a creature card this way, Cragganwick Cremator deals damage equal to that card's power to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Each night that his bowl fills, a village mourns.

name: Crimson Wisps
oracle_text: Target creature becomes red and gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The whispers are incomprehensible, yet cinders always hear a message of urgency.

name: Deep-Slumber Titan
oracle_text: Deep-Slumber Titan enters the battlefield tapped.
Deep-Slumber Titan doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever Deep-Slumber Titan is dealt damage, untap it.
flavor_text: Do not disturb.

name: Elemental Mastery
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste, where X is this creature's power. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step."

name: Ember Gale
oracle_text: Creatures target player controls can't block this turn. Ember Gale deals 1 damage to each white and/or blue creature that player controls.
flavor_text:
"Terrible wind. It whipped sparks into our skin, then stoked them even hotter!"
—Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

name: Flame Javelin
oracle_text: ({2/R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)
Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.

name: Furystoke Giant
oracle_text: When Furystoke Giant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 2 damage to any target" until end of turn.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Horde of Boggarts
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Horde of Boggarts's power and toughness are each equal to the number of red permanents you control.
flavor_text: Strategies don't come easily to the boggarts' feral minds, but full-on assault hasn't failed them yet.

name: Inescapable Brute
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Inescapable Brute must be blocked if able.
flavor_text: If you think you made it past him alive, he's just teasing you.

name: Intimidator Initiate
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Don't stand in his way, for his way is full of pointy things and fire.

name: Jaws of Stone
oracle_text: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast this spell.
flavor_text: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.

name: Knollspine Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
When Knollspine Dragon enters the battlefield, you may discard your hand and draw cards equal to the damage dealt to target opponent this turn.
flavor_text: It woke to find a vast world in need of a master.

name: Knollspine Invocation
oracle_text: {X}, Discard a card with converted mana cost X: Knollspine Invocation deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text: Witches tempted by the power of flame gathered to study in the ruins of Spinerock Knoll.

name: Mudbrawler Cohort
oracle_text: Haste
Mudbrawler Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another red creature.
flavor_text: Before a raid, the members of Wort's gang egg each other on with tales of their hunger and what they'll do to sate it, each outdoing the last.

name: Power of Fire
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor_text: The cinders believe their flame was stolen by one they call the Extinguisher. All who now wield fire draw their desperate wrath.

name: Puncture Bolt
oracle_text: Puncture Bolt deals 1 damage to target creature. Put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.
flavor_text: Cinder pyromancers measure their success by counting their enemies' smoking holes.

name: Pyre Charger
oracle_text: Haste
{R}: Pyre Charger gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: His blade was forged over coals of moaning treefolk, curved at the optimum angle for severing heads, and heated to volcanic temperatures by his touch.

name: Rage Reflection
oracle_text: Creatures you control have double strike.
flavor_text: Vengeance is a dish best served twice.

name: Rustrazor Butcher
oracle_text: First strike
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: A Bloodwort's blade is salted with blood and peppered with rust, seasoning and slaughtering in a single swipe.

name: Slinking Giant
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Whenever Slinking Giant blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I need a better hiding place."

name: Smash to Smithereens
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
flavor_text: The giant Tarvik dreamed that trinkets and machines caused all the world's woe. When he awoke from his troubled sleep, he took the name Tarvik Relicsmasher.

name: Wild Swing
oracle_text: Choose three target nonenchantment permanents. Destroy one of them at random.
flavor_text: Though the shaman rarely got what she wanted, she was never disappointed in the result.

name: Crabapple Cohort
oracle_text: Crabapple Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another green creature.
flavor_text: Seven wives made seven pies from seven apples, each plucked from its branches. Now bare and bitter, it comes to exact its price: one apple, one bone.

name: Devoted Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
Put a -1/-1 counter on Devoted Druid: Untap Devoted Druid.
flavor_text: "Mana lurks in all things, even in the depths of one's own heart."

name: Dramatic Entrance
oracle_text: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: Some things aren't worth waiting for.

name: Drove of Elves
oracle_text: Hexproof
Drove of Elves's power and toughness are each equal to the number of green permanents you control.
flavor_text: "The light of beauty protects our journeys through darkness."

name: Farhaven Elf
oracle_text: When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "Verdant bloom does exist. It merely hides for its own safety."

name: Flourishing Defenses
oracle_text: Whenever a -1/-1 counter is put on a creature, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor_text: Many horrors take the bait of brave elf volunteers walking alone, only to fall to the blades of rescuers lurking nearby.

name: Foxfire Oak
oracle_text: {R/G}{R/G}{R/G}: Foxfire Oak gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The brethren shall blaze with unnatural fire, and the flame shall consume and purify our rage."
—Treefolk catastrophe myth

name: Gleeful Sabotage
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Gloomwidow
oracle_text: Reach
Gloomwidow can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: When gloomwidows mature, they abandon venom in favor of massive webs that span the eaves of cliffs.

name: Gloomwidow's Feast
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. If that creature was blue or black, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Each night, gloomwidows cull fresh prey for their ravenous hatchlings.

name: Howl of the Night Pack
oracle_text: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token for each Forest you control.
flavor_text: The murderous horrors of Raven's Run are legendary, but even that haunted place goes quiet when the night wolves howl.

name: Hungry Spriggan
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Hungry Spriggan attacks, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: If a spriggan's eyes are larger than its stomach, it has ways to remedy the situation.

name: Juvenile Gloomwidow
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: Gloomwidow venom is particularly virulent during the spider's first years, when it does most of its hunting near the forest floor.

name: Mana Reflection
oracle_text: If you tap a permanent for mana, it produces twice as much of that mana instead.
flavor_text: Despite its darkness, Shadowmoor doesn't want for growth. Legions of creeping things thrive in the shade.

name: Mossbridge Troll
oracle_text: If Mossbridge Troll would be destroyed, regenerate it.
Tap any number of untapped creatures you control other than Mossbridge Troll with total power 10 or greater: Mossbridge Troll gets +20/+20 until end of turn.

name: Nurturer Initiate
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The elves alone preserve the few shreds of beauty left. There is no one else who cares.

name: Presence of Gond
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."
flavor_text: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

name: Prismatic Omen
oracle_text: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.
flavor_text: In times of portent, the land sculpts itself in accordance with the sigils burned on the sky.

name: Raking Canopy
oracle_text: Whenever a creature with flying attacks you, Raking Canopy deals 4 damage to it.
flavor_text:
"Raven's Run has awoken, and ravens will no longer cry in its branches."
—Roon Ghastbark

name: Roughshod Mentor
oracle_text: Green creatures you control have trample.
flavor_text: He didn't hear the cries of the treefolk whose branches he snapped or of the elves caught underfoot. He had eyes only for the path ahead.

name: Spawnwrithe
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Spawnwrithe deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Spawnwrithe.
flavor_text: Its victims feel only an itchy, wriggling feeling just under their skin. By then, it's far too late.

name: Toil to Renown
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each tapped artifact, creature, and land you control.
flavor_text: The last survivor of her patrol, the warrior returned expecting disappointment and scorn. Instead she found gratitude. "You are alive. That is reason to celebrate."

name: Tower Above
oracle_text: ({2/G} can be paid with any two mana or with {G}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)

Until end of turn, target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample, wither, and "When this creature attacks, target creature blocks it this turn if able." (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

name: Viridescent Wisps
oracle_text: Target creature becomes green and gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: In the wisps that night, the once timid boggart saw all the terrible, bloody things he was capable of. And it was glorious.

name: Wildslayer Elves
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
flavor_text: Some elves battled too long in the deep shadow, their swords dipped too often in tainted flesh and poisoned blood.

name: Witherscale Wurm
oracle_text: Whenever Witherscale Wurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature gains wither until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Whenever Witherscale Wurm deals damage to an opponent, remove all -1/-1 counters from it.

name: Woodfall Primus

When Woodfall Primus enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature permanent.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Aethertow
oracle_text: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Augury Adept
oracle_text: Whenever Augury Adept deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor_text: Moonstones grant limited foresight but unlimited advantages.

name: Barrenton Cragtreads
oracle_text: Barrenton Cragtreads can't be blocked by red creatures.
flavor_text: "Boggarts are easy to get around. Just toss some mutton in another direction. Giants are a little harder. You have to be quick to avoid their steps. Cinders are the difficult ones, but even they have fears to be exploited."

name: Curse of Chains
oracle_text: Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, tap enchanted creature.
flavor_text: The giant's real punishment was the fleeting moment when he was allowed to stand before being dragged down to his knees again.

name: Enchanted Evening
oracle_text: All permanents are enchantments in addition to their other types.
flavor_text: In the reflection, she saw the rough shell of the world sloughing away, revealing the truth shining underneath.

name: Glamer Spinners
oracle_text: Flash
Flying
When Glamer Spinners enters the battlefield, attach all Auras enchanting target permanent to another permanent with the same controller.

name: Godhead of Awe
oracle_text: Flying
Other creatures have base power and toughness 1/1.
flavor_text:
"What she saw crawling upon this world repulsed her. Yet she could not tear her gaze away."
—The Seer's Parables

name: Mirrorweave
oracle_text: Each other creature becomes a copy of target nonlegendary creature until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Those who are different are untrustworthy, unpredictable. Put your safety in the hands of your own kind."
—Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

name: Mistmeadow Witch
oracle_text: {2}{W}{U}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Plumeveil
oracle_text: Flash
Defender, flying
flavor_text:

—Grensch, merrow cutthroat

name: Puresight Merrow
oracle_text: {W/U}, {Q}: Look at the top card of your library. You may exile that card. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: Stripped of his sight, he was free to see only the ideal.

name: Repel Intruders
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens if {W} was spent to cast Repel Intruders. Counter up to one target creature spell if {U} was spent to cast Repel Intruders. (Do both if {W}{U} was spent.)

name: Silkbind Faerie
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{W/U}, {Q}: Tap target creature. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: "The bigger they are, the more fun it is to watch them fall flat on their faces."

name: Somnomancer
oracle_text: When Somnomancer enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.
flavor_text: "Are you tired? You look tired."

name: Steel of the Godhead

As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

name: Swans of Bryn Argoll
oracle_text: Flying
If a source would deal damage to Swans of Bryn Argoll, prevent that damage. The source's controller draws cards equal to the damage prevented this way.

name: Thistledown Duo
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a white spell, Thistledown Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a blue spell, Thistledown Duo gains flying until end of turn.

name: Thistledown Liege

Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.
Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: The thoughtweft is his informant, and he its devoted guardian.

name: Thoughtweft Gambit
oracle_text: Tap all creatures your opponents control and untap all creatures you control.
flavor_text: The kithkin mind-bond is even tighter in Shadowmoor, reinforcing the unity of their community to the point of xenophobia.

name: Turn to Mist
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"Did you expect me to dodge? How quaint."
—Olka, mistmeadow witch

name: Worldpurge
oracle_text: Return all permanents to their owners' hands. Each player chooses up to seven cards in their hand, then shuffles the rest into their library. Each player loses all unspent mana.
flavor_text: The Aurora is not the only magic capable of remaking a world.

name: Zealous Guardian
oracle_text: Flash
flavor_text: Parapet watchers patrol the outer edges of the doun, signaling to others who wait patiently in shadow.

name: Cemetery Puca
oracle_text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, Cemetery Puca becomes a copy of that creature, except it has this ability.
flavor_text:
"'Tis a strange creature indeed that chooses the vanquished over the victor."
—Awylla, elvish safewright

name: Dire Undercurrents
oracle_text: Whenever a blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player draw a card.
Whenever a black creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player discard a card.

name: Dream Salvage
oracle_text: Draw cards equal to the number of cards target opponent discarded this turn.
flavor_text: Awylla tried hard to forget the horrors she had seen, but someone else had developed a keen interest in them.

name: Fate Transfer
oracle_text: Move all counters from target creature onto another target creature.
flavor_text:
"The cinders find strength in suffering, the elves in beauty. But if you make an elf suffer, he gets weaker. I wonder what happens if you make a cinder beautiful?"
—Hrugash, leech bonder

name: Ghastlord of Fugue
oracle_text: Ghastlord of Fugue can't be blocked.
Whenever Ghastlord of Fugue deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player exiles that card.
flavor_text:

—The Seer's Parables

name: Glen Elendra Liege
oracle_text: Flying

oracle_text: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
flavor_text:

name: Helm of the Ghastlord

As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card."

name: Inkfathom Infiltrator
oracle_text: Inkfathom Infiltrator can't block and can't be blocked.

name: Inkfathom Witch
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
{2}{U}{B}: Each unblocked creature has base power and toughness 4/1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The murk of the Wanderbrine concealed unseemly rituals designed to bring out the worst in merrowkind.

name: Memory Plunder
oracle_text: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text:
"Vengeance is the echo of the victim's own crime."
—Grensch, merrow cutthroat

name: Oona, Queen of the Fae
oracle_text: Flying

{X}{U/B}: Choose a color. Target opponent exiles the top X cards of their library. For each card of the chosen color exiled this way, create a 1/1 blue and black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

name: Oona's Gatewarden
oracle_text: Defender, flying
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

name: Scarscale Ritual

name: Sygg, River Cutthroat

flavor_text: "It's not a matter of deserving. It's a matter of strength. The power to hold versus the power to take."

name: Torpor Dust
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
flavor_text: "Some folk these days are too restless to dream the dreams we need. We need to teach them to stop and catch their breath."

name: Wanderbrine Rootcutters
oracle_text: Wanderbrine Rootcutters can't be blocked by green creatures.
flavor_text: Most dirtwalkers only know of the vicious merrows that dwell in the shallows. They can't begin to fathom the wickedness that skulks in the Dark Meanders.

name: Wasp Lancer
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"I doubt that faeries understand how short their lives are, compared to the rest of us. If they did, would they so readily charge into battle, heedless of the danger before them?"

name: Ashenmoor Gouger
oracle_text: Ashenmoor Gouger can't block.
flavor_text: After his hands had crumbled away, leaving only wickedly sharp points, he decided his only purpose was war.

name: Cultbrand Cinder

Flying, haste

name: Scar

{T}: Target black or red creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Sootwalkers

Whenever a player draws a card, Spiteful Visions deals 1 damage to that player.

name: Impromptu Raid

name: Loamdragger Giant
flavor_text: Giants sleep soundly and long, sometimes for long enough that a crust of earth and moss grows over them. But inevitably something disturbs their slumber, and they wake unhappy.

name: Manamorphose
oracle_text: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
Draw a card.

name: Mudbrawler Raiders
oracle_text: Mudbrawler Raiders can't be blocked by blue creatures.

name: Rosheen Meanderer
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only on costs that contain {X}.
flavor_text: Night after night, Rosheen babbled about a bygone sunlit world, her every word dismissed as a madwoman's ravings.

name: Runes of the Deus

flavor_text: Elvish dawnhands test a relic's worthiness before collecting it for the safehold. If it can't stand up to a stiff breeze, it's left behind.

name: Heartmender
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a -1/-1 counter from each creature you control.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Kitchen Finks
oracle_text: When Kitchen Finks enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Accept one favor from an ouphe, and you're doomed to accept another.

name: Medicine Runner
oracle_text: When Medicine Runner enters the battlefield, you may remove a counter from target permanent.
flavor_text: Elvish healers carry vials of the balm known as dawnglow, reserving it for those wounds that herbs cannot treat.

name: Mercy Killing
oracle_text: Target creature's controller sacrifices it, then creates X 1/1 green and white Elf Warrior creature tokens, where X is that creature's power.
flavor_text: "We will give you the peace you seek, though you may not yet know you seek it."

name: Old Ghastbark
flavor_text:
"Beware of trees that talk. Their words are threats. And mind the ones that sway and creak. They too threaten us, but in a foreign tongue."
—The Book of Other Folk

name: Oracle of Nectars
oracle_text: {X}, {T}: You gain X life.
flavor_text: When elves find a fount of beauty, they protect it. Where there is beauty, there is hope.

name: Oversoul of Dusk
oracle_text: Protection from blue, from black, and from red
flavor_text:
"Some say she hid the sun herself, a desperate act to save it from its ultimate extinction."
—The Seer's Parables

name: Raven's Run Dragoon
oracle_text: Raven's Run Dragoon can't be blocked by black creatures.
flavor_text: "I have a gift. The ability to sense encroaching darkness has saved many lives. And yet constantly feeling the force of so much ugliness is a terrible burden."

name: Reknit
oracle_text: Regenerate target permanent.
flavor_text:
"An axe may break upon a ribbon if the ribbon's will is the stronger."
—Awylla, elvish safewright

name: Rhys the Redeemed
oracle_text: {2}{G/W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green and white Elf Warrior creature token.
{4}{G/W}{G/W}, {T}: For each creature token you control, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
flavor_text: Whole again in honor and horn.

name: Safehold Duo
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a green spell, Safehold Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a white spell, Safehold Duo gains vigilance until end of turn.

name: Safehold Elite
oracle_text: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: "I refuse to die—not at the hands of one such as you."

name: Safewright Quest
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Elves search for sources of beauty in a nighted world. Meanwhile, the nighted world searches for the blood of elves.

name: Seedcradle Witch
oracle_text: {2}{G}{W}: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
flavor_text: She whispered a prayer for strength, and her wishes wafted away like seeds on the wind.

name: Shield of the Oversoul
oracle_text: Enchant creature

As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and has indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)
As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

name: Wheel of Sun and Moon
oracle_text: Enchant player
If a card would be put into enchanted player's graveyard from anywhere, instead that card is revealed and put on the bottom of that player's library.
flavor_text: Every life ends, but life itself never does.

name: Wilt-Leaf Cavaliers
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: Every elf in Shadowmoor is charged from birth with a terrible duty: to strike back against the ugliness and darkness, even though they are all around and seemingly without end.

name: Wilt-Leaf Liege
oracle_text: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1.
Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.
If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Wilt-Leaf Liege, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

name: Blazethorn Scarecrow
oracle_text: Blazethorn Scarecrow has haste as long as you control a red creature.
Blazethorn Scarecrow has wither as long as you control a green creature. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

name: Blight Sickle
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has wither. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Equip {2}
flavor_text: Its scars cut deeper than its blade.

name: Cauldron of Souls
oracle_text: {T}: Choose any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures gains persist until end of turn. (When it dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Chainbreaker
oracle_text: Chainbreaker enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it.
{3}, {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature.
flavor_text: Scarecrows deemed too malevolent to roam free are shackled to boulders or dolmen stones. Their animosity usually outlives the chains.

name: Elsewhere Flask
oracle_text: When Elsewhere Flask enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Sacrifice Elsewhere Flask: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.
flavor_text: One night Oona bottled the sky. The next night she aligned the stars and released it.

name: Gnarled Effigy
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Bits of fallen scarecrow, laces of elfskin leather, teeth of an axeshark merrow . . . An industrious soul can find new uses for the most mundane items."
—Mowagh the Gwyllion

name: Grim Poppet
oracle_text: Grim Poppet enters the battlefield with three -1/-1 counters on it.
Remove a -1/-1 counter from Grim Poppet: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.
flavor_text: Beware a scarecrow bearing gifts—especially sloshing vessels of acid.

name: Heap Doll
oracle_text: Sacrifice Heap Doll: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"I know one night it won't come back. Then I'll know it's truly done its job."
—Braenna, cobblesmith

name: Illuminated Folio
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Reveal two cards from your hand that share a color: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Most such relics remain clasped shut for fear of what ominous truths might be carved into the diptych inside.

name: Lockjaw Snapper
oracle_text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
When Lockjaw Snapper dies, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.

name: Lurebound Scarecrow
oracle_text: As Lurebound Scarecrow enters the battlefield, choose a color.
When you control no permanents of the chosen color, sacrifice Lurebound Scarecrow.
flavor_text: It's a fool's race to run if all is lost if it be won.

name: Painter's Servant
oracle_text: As Painter's Servant enters the battlefield, choose a color.
All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.
flavor_text: It gathers hues from the twilight mist so that its master can paint a better world.

name: Pili-Pala
oracle_text: Flying
{2}, {Q}: Add one mana of any color. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: It wasn't really expected to fly. Then again, it wasn't expected to move, either.

name: Rattleblaze Scarecrow
oracle_text: Rattleblaze Scarecrow has persist as long as you control a black creature. (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
Rattleblaze Scarecrow has haste as long as you control a red creature.

name: Reaper King
oracle_text: ({2/W} can be paid with any two mana or with {W}. This card's converted mana cost is 10.)
Other Scarecrow creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever another Scarecrow enters the battlefield under your control, destroy target permanent.
flavor_text: It's harvest time.

name: Revelsong Horn
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A deflated sigh breathed into the horn emerges as an inspiring melody.

name: Scrapbasket
oracle_text: {1}: Scrapbasket becomes all colors until end of turn.
flavor_text: Once a tool of kithkin farmers, scarecrows of all shapes now skitter and lurch across Shadowmoor, animated by residual rustic magics.

name: Scuttlemutt
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: Built to shuttle goods from the river, it took off one day carrying a cauldron of dyes.

name: Tatterkite
oracle_text: Flying
Tatterkite can't have counters put on it.
flavor_text:
"I rigged it together from wicker and scrap, yet somehow I find it unalterably perfect."
—Braenna, cobblesmith

name: Thornwatch Scarecrow
oracle_text: Thornwatch Scarecrow has wither as long as you control a green creature. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Thornwatch Scarecrow has vigilance as long as you control a white creature.

name: Trip Noose
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: A taut slipknot trigger is the only thing standing between you and standing.

name: Umbral Mantle
oracle_text: Equipped creature has "{3}, {Q}: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn." ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
Equip {0}
flavor_text: It harnesses the power of night in a land where daylight fears to show itself.

name: Watchwing Scarecrow
oracle_text: Watchwing Scarecrow has vigilance as long as you control a white creature.
Watchwing Scarecrow has flying as long as you control a blue creature.
flavor_text: The wings are held in place by wicker rods. The rods are held in place by pure faith.

name: Wicker Warcrawler
oracle_text: Whenever Wicker Warcrawler attacks or blocks, put a -1/-1 counter on it at end of combat.
flavor_text: It's the twisted creation of a kithkin diviner who dreamed of very large crows.

name: Wingrattle Scarecrow
oracle_text: Wingrattle Scarecrow has flying as long as you control a blue creature.

Wingrattle Scarecrow has persist as long as you control a black creature. (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

name: Fire-Lit Thicket
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Occupancy of the den changes from night to night as boggart gangs fight for control of a place they aren't willing to simply eat.

name: Graven Cairns
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text:
"Here did the Extinguisher steal the light from the world. Here will we sacrifice her to bring the Great Rekindling to our people."
—Illulia of Nighthearth

name: Leechridden Swamp
oracle_text: Leechridden Swamp enters the battlefield tapped.
{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more black permanents.

name: Madblind Mountain
oracle_text: Madblind Mountain enters the battlefield tapped.
{R}, {T}: Shuffle your library. Activate this ability only if you control two or more red permanents.

name: Mistveil Plains
oracle_text: Mistveil Plains enters the battlefield tapped.
{W}, {T}: Put target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. Activate this ability only if you control two or more white permanents.

name: Moonring Island
oracle_text: Moonring Island enters the battlefield tapped.
{U}, {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. Activate this ability only if you control two or more blue permanents.

name: Mystic Gate
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: The gate of every kithkin doun is a cunning trap, intended to spill visitors into an oubliette from which there is no escape.

name: Reflecting Pool
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.
flavor_text: Does it reflect the future that once was or the past that can never be?

name: Sapseep Forest
oracle_text: Sapseep Forest enters the battlefield tapped.
{G}, {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more green permanents.

name: Sunken Ruins
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Without the care of the tideshapers, the Lanes lie neglected. Some have flooded entire towns; others dried to cracked mud.

name: Wooded Bastion
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: The elves of Wilt-Leaf Wood continually expand the palisade surrounding the sanctuary. They hope to one day enclose the entire forest within its walls.
